title: 4 Easy Ways to Block Someone on Snapchat

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This is the white ghost with a yellow background. Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now, or create an account . If you don't have a chat with the person you want to block, you can also block them through username search , their story , or on the Snap Map .

steps.title: Tap the "Chat" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Chat" icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. [1] X Research source You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends.

steps.title: Tap and hold the user you want to block.
steps.content: Tap and hold the user you want to block. A pop-up menu will open for that user.

steps.title: Tap Manage Friendship.
steps.content: Tap Manage Friendship . This will be above Chat Settings . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . This will be in red. [3] X Research source A pop-up will open.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . The Snapchat user will be blocked. [4] X Research source They won't be able to message you or view your Story. To unblock someone , tap your profile picture in the top-left corner. Tap the cog icon in the top-right corner. Scroll down and tap Blocked . Tap the x next to the user you want to unblock, then tap Yes to confirm. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This is the white ghost with a yellow background. Use this method to quickly block someone using the search function. This can be used to block users who are not on your friend list. If you don't want to fully block someone, you can mute them instead.

steps.title: Tap the magnifying glass icon.
steps.content: Tap the magnifying glass icon. This will be in the top-left corner, next to your profile picture.

steps.title: In the search field, enter the username of the person you want to block.
steps.content: In the search field, enter the username of the person you want to block. The search results will load below.

steps.title: Tap and hold the user's icon.
steps.content: Tap and hold the user's icon. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . This is in red, underneath the person's profile picture.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . The Snapchat user will be blocked.

steps.content: Tap the map icon. This is the icon at the bottom-left corner.

steps.content: Tap the user you want to block. You'll be able to see their Bitmoji on the map if they have it active. A pop-up menu will open on the bottom.
